q: Eric Schmidt guided Google past early doubts that it could build a leading ad business around a search engine. He also oversaw the 2004 initial public offering, was the biggest for an internet firm. We view this as evidence of the founders staying fully engaged in the business- a positive, said Citigroup analyst Mark Mahaney . Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.
